name: Lost in the Forest
description: Survive the wilderness! Find your way through the forest, rescue friends, and escape to safety.

messages.bearWarning: A bear attacks! Hold E near the bear with a knife to defeat it.
messages.tooCold: Too cold! You need to wear a Sweater (press T) to walk on snow.
messages.cantSwim: Can't swim! Place a raft on the water.
messages.doorUnlockHint: Face the door and hold E to unlock with {color} key
messages.cardDoorUnlockHint: Face the door and hold E to unlock with {color} keycard
messages.needKeyToEscape: You need a Key to escape!
messages.treeChopped: Tree chopped! Wood left on ground.
messages.raftBuilt: Built a raft! You can now place it on water with E.
messages.defeatedBear: Defeated the bear! Got a sweater.
messages.cantPickupRaftOnIt: Can't pick up raft while standing on it!
messages.sweaterWorn: Put on the sweater. Now you can walk through snow!
messages.cantRemoveSweaterOnSnow: Can't remove sweater while standing on snow! You'll freeze!
messages.inventoryFull: Inventory full! ({max} items max) Press Q to drop items.
messages.ancientGateOpened: üåü The ancient gate opens with a mystical glow!
messages.pathBroken: ‚ùå You broke the path sequence. Start again from the beginning.
messages.pathLeft: ‚ùå You left the path. Start again from the beginning.
messages.caveBlocked: You can't enter the cave from here. Find the cave entrance!
messages.caveExitBlocked: You can't exit the cave here. Find the cave entrance to leave!
